error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'total_rice' (value: 50) was used instead of 'rice_kept_by_llesis' (value: 35).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 35
Mr. Llesis kept 50 x 7/10 = <<50*7/10=35>>35 kilograms of rice.
So, he gave 50 - 35 = <<50-35=15>>15 kilograms of rice to Mr. Everest.
Therefore, Mr. Llesis kept 50 - 15 = <<50-15=35>>35 kilograms more than Mr. Everest.
